title: AHS: 1984 Episode 3 Preview Breakdown | "Slashdance"
author: Think Story
comment:
Next week's preview
Xavier : "What the hell are you doing down there man? "
Chet : "I'm DYYYING"
Slashdance is just a play on words, from the ultimate 80's classic Flashdance.....

Surprised you didn't mention how the psychologist emphasizes the word "method" in her flashback line.    Also, all the heavy-handedness from the writers around the word "trauma" through every episode reminds me of the way that Method actors, especially of that school of thought, based everything about their recall and expression on earlier, personal traumas that they had faced in real life.  I can start to see that "Actors Reenacting" theory maybe being legit now.
I look forward to every single video you make man. You're hilarious and informative. Please stay on lol
description:
Time to breakdown and review American Horror Story's episode 3 preview "Slashdance" where we look for clues, theories, and easter eggs for what the show has in store.
